The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 11 July is 47,536 (5,502 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 06 July, there were 2,028 new confirmed cases (234.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 29 June, there were 1,053 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 93% (975 extra cases).
